message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the interest in selling me the product, but I believe I can find something similar at a lower price. I am willing to pay $90 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your honesty about finding something similar at a lower price. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the quality of the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe there might be a better deal out there for me. I would like to propose $100 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
